TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class FontFamily : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontFamily extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class FontFamily Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable
public ref class FontFamily sealed : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable
type FontFamily = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IDisposable

summary.span: 定義具有相似基本設計和特定樣式變化的字體群組。

span.span: Defines a group of type faces having a similar basic design and certain variations in styles.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的所有字型家族屬性類別。The following code example shows all the font families in the property of the class. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 若要執行此範例中，新增名為`listBox1`至表單和呼叫`PopulateListBoxWithFonts`從表單的建構函式的方法。To run this example, add a named `listBox1` to a form and call the `PopulateListBoxWithFonts` method from the form's constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 釋放這個 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫可讓由這個資源重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: Gets the height, in font design units, of the em square for the specified style.
The height of the em square.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *Em 方形*指的是印刷樣式表示字型的廣泛的字母，傳統字母 M 所佔據的矩形。*Em square* is a typography term that refers to the rectangle occupied by the font's widest letter, traditionally the letter M. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 取得字型家族的 em 方形的高度。Gets the em square height for that font family. - 當做文字繪製到螢幕的 em 高度的值。Draws the value of the em height to the screen as text. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicFontFamilyExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指出非語言相關，您應該指定為 0`language`參數。To indicate language neutral, you should specify 0 for the `language` parameter. 如需可用的語言和參閲清單，請參閱 Winnt.h 標頭檔。For a listing of the available languages and sublanguages, see the Winnt.h header file. 如果您已安裝的 Visual Studio 時，此標頭檔通常找到在 Visual Studio 安裝目錄的相對\\\VC\PlatformSDK\Include。If you have Visual Studio installed, this header file can typically be found relative to the Visual Studio installation directory at \\\VC\PlatformSDK\Include. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 取得字型家族的名稱。Gets the name of the font family. - 當做文字繪製到螢幕的字型家族的名稱。Draws the name of the font family to the screen as text.
